abstracts.cdata!:
The development objectives of the Second
            municipal Finance Project are to: a)increase the provision
            of basic infrastructure services in small and medium size
            cities; and b) strengthen Fonds d'Equipement Communal
            (FEC) as a commercially viable, autonomous financial
            instittution specialized into providing financial services
            to the municipal sector.  The project consists of two
            components: a) municipal infrastructure - including eligible
            beneficiaries, on-lending arrangements, bank financing, and
            free limit and subloan approval; and b) institutional development.
